column2: Trump Dogged By 'Loser-Palooza' Airplane Message At Florida Rally
column5: Embarrassing news came for Donald Trump from on high during his Sarasota rally Saturday in the form of a plane flashing the neon message: â€œLoser-Palooza.â€ The message â€” flying over the Florida fairgrounds where Trump was speechifying â€” was funded and arranged by the anti-Trump pot-stirring political action committeeÂ MeidasTouch.
